item.name: Access Token
item.description: POST \[UAT\] Obtain access token for a user [http://oliver.cinnamonstar.net:8080/realms/myrealm/protocol/openid-connect/token](http://oliver.cinnamonstar.net:8080/realms/myrealm/protocol/openid-connect/token) Obtain UAT = user access token from a user in realm ### Headers | content-type | application/x-www-form-urlencoded | | --- | --- | ### Body | | | | --- | --- | | grant_type | password | | client_id | admin-cli | | username | rkcadmin | | password | Welcome1 | ## POST\[SAT\] Obtain accsess token from a service account [http://oliver.cinnamonstar.net:8080/realms/myrealm/protocol/openid-connect/token](http://oliver.cinnamonstar.net:8080/realms/myrealm/protocol/openid-connect/token) Obtain SAT (service account token) ### Headers | content-type | application/x-www-form-urlencoded | | --- | --- | ### Body | | | | --- | --- | | grant_type | client_credentials | | client_id | service-account | | client_secret | Welcome1 |
